title: Dismantling the Apartheid of Our Time: the Palestinian Liberation Movement as an anti-racist struggle
itunes:author: Dr Noura Erakat
description: Contributor(s): Dr Noura Erakat | The report built on decades of the intellectual work and political advocacy of Palestinians scholars and organizations. Notably, the HRW report diverges from those legacies in significant ways.
